title_page: Things I've made trying to improve my software dev skills.
introduction_page: During my university years and after being a university student I've carried out various projects to learn some development technology and others have been to participate in hackathons.
title_1: Home automation through blockchain in the polkadot network
description_1: This project won second place at the Hackathon Web3 ITAM 2023, the FastAPI framework was used for the backend where data from different sensors was received using Robonomics tools and it was complemented with a mobile application to control lights using blockchain.
